title: Exploring One of the First iPads Ever Sold - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Exploring One of the First iPads Ever Sold
Exploring One of the First iPads Ever Sold - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: The iPad was released on April 3, 2010, and Krazy Ken was FIRST in line to buy one of the first ones ever sold. Today, he tells you his launch day story, then candidly explores the ancient remains of the iPad.  Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #53 - Exploring One of the First  iPads Ever Sold  Cat Noir Easter egg by:   Contact the CC    Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.) Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
